General.Name: Jiangsu Bide Science and Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Jiangsu Bide Science and Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of railway passenger vehicle accessories in China. It offers cable protection systems, air conditioning ventilations, sanding devices, and other accessories of locomotives and vehicles. The company was formerly known as Jiangyin Bide Science and Technology Development Co., Ltd. Jiangsu Bide Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

1.Name: Mr. Shuangxi  Tang
1.Title: Director, Deputy GM, CFO & Sec. of the Board

2.Name: Mr. Xiaoming  Xue
2.Title: Director of Technology R&D and Director
